content: Hello Jeyachandran! It's nice to meet you. Thank you for coming in today for this technical round of the interview. Can you tell me more about your experience with AI project development, specifically with regards to your internship at Shine Logics, where you worked on an AI chatbot with real-time database integration? What was your role in that project and what did you learn from it?
